Clearbit | Full stack, Frontend, Design lead, and Product managers | San Francisco, CA and Chattanooga, TN | Onsite or remote|https://clearbit.com

As an early engineer at Clearbit, you'll have a huge impact on our product and direction. You'll be working very closely with the rest of our team, creating APIs, building out applications, and managing huge amounts of data.

Engineers at Clearbit work primarily with Ruby/Sinatra, Postgres/Sequel, Go, and React (for frontend folks). We're always learning, so you can expect this list to change and grow over time.

Message/email me with questions!

Direct link: https://jobs.lever.co/clearbit/ddd0dcc6-677c-4ef5-90a7-7ab10...

Disclaimer - I'm an engineer at Clearbit, and the above link is a referral link. If you prefer not to use the referral, feel free to go directly to our open positions page: https://jobs.lever.co/clearbit
